title: Learn Digital Ledgers by Building a Blockchain
description: In this course, you will learn how to build a blockchain from scratch using JavaScript.

title: Learn Proof of Work by Building a Block Miner
description: In this course, you will learn how to use the SHA-256 hashing algorithm make your blockchain more secure.

title: Learn Digital Signatures by Buiding a Wallet
description: In this course, you will learn how to generate and use keypairs so you can veryify users and transactions.

title: Build a Video Game Marketplace Blockchain
description: In this integrated project, you will build a blockchain where you can buy and sell items for a video game.

title: Learn Smart Contracts by Building a Car Loan Contract
description: In this course, you will learn about immutable digital agreements by building a smart contract for a car loan.

title: Learn NFT's by Building a Set of Concert Tickets
description: In this course, you will learn about digital ownership on the blockchain by building a set of concert tickets.

title: Build a Fundraising Smart Contract
description: In this integrated project, you will create and deploy a smart contract to raise funds for your start-up.

title: Learn Websockets by Building a Chat App
Learn Distributed Networks by Building Distributed Chat App
Build a Peer-to-Peer Network
description: In this integrated project, you will build distributed peer-to-peer network for your blockchain.

title: Learn Proof of Stake Consensus by Completing a Web3 Game
description: In this course, you will learn about Proof of Stake Consensus by completing the boilerplate given to you, and playing the Web3 game.

title: Learn RPC and IDLs by Building a dApp
description: In this course, you will learn about Remote Procedural Calls and Interface Description Languages which are an integral part of most decentralised blockchains.

title: Build a Web3 Client-Side Package for Your dApp
description: In this integrated project, you will put your new Web3 knowledge to the test, by developing a package for use by client-side dApps.

title: Learn Basic Rust by Building a CLI Wallet
Learn Intermediate Rust by Building a Blockchain
description: In this course, you will learn Rust by building a blockchain using Rust.

title: Learn Smart Contracts by Building a Dumb Contract in Rust
description: In this course, you will learn how to use WASM with Rust to compile your code into byte code, store it on your blockchain, and run it.

title: Build a Smart Contract in Rust
description: In this integrated project, you will build a smart contract to store and run on your blockchain.
